actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Commodity Exchange Act to require public disclosure of certain information relating to sales of commodities for export, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Commodity Exchange Act to require exporters of wheat, corn, or soybeans to report specified export sales information (commodity identity and quantity, sales date and destination) to the Commodity Futures Trading Commission. Requires the Commission to: (1) make such information available to the public; and (2) implement this Act within 90 days. Directs the Commission to revoke the registration (for 12 months) of any broker violating these provisions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Commodity Exchange Act to require public disclosure of certain information relating to sales of commodities for export, and for other purposes.
